sourcesContent:
// src/pages/TermsAndConditions.js import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const TermsAndConditions = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('terms.title', 'Terms and Conditions')}

1. Accurate Information

Customer is responsible for providing an accurate address, including street, house number and postcode.

2. Deposit Policy

A 50% deposit is required at the time of booking to confirm the service along with a valid phone number and email address. This deposit will be refunded should the service be cancelled more than 72 hours in advance. All deposits become non-refundable if the booking is cancelled within less than 72 hours from the pick up date.

3. Rescheduling

If your plans change, ERemovals will allow you to reschedule the date whenever possible if given at least 72 hours notice.

4. Inventory

Customers are to provide an accurate list of items in advance. Please note non-listed items may be subject to additional charges on the day.

5. Liability

ERemovals is not responsible for the contents of the parcels in transit but will ensure they are transported safely and securely to their destination.

6. Prohibited Items

ERemovals will not transport chemicals, flammable or illegal substances, weapons or items that can, in any way, harm or put at risk the wellbeing of its employees.

7. Code of Conduct

ERemovals will not, in any way, tolerate harassment or abuse from any customer to its employees and will report these actions to the local authorities, if necessary.

); }; export default TermsAndConditions;
